casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Carlos RODRIGUEZ. No. 302A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 19, 2016. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Rodriguez, Juan Carlos. John F. Carella, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Rodriguez, Juan Carlos. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Jennifer Martin, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Patrick B. Weede, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Michael Silver, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of January 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of January 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 29th day of February 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
